title: Botswana Total Public External Debt
description: External Debt in Botswana increased to 17462.20 BWP Million in the second quarter of 2022 from 17367 BWP Million in the first quarter of 2022. External Debt in Botswana averaged 13317.02 BWP Million from 2002 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 18344.85 BWP Million in the first quarter of 2016 and a record low of 1771.80 BWP Million in the first quarter of 2008. This page provides - Botswana External Debt- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Botswana
